text: Trần Tiểu Vy (born 23 August 2000) is a Vietnamese model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Vietnam 2018. She represented Vietnam at the Miss World 2018 pageant. == Early life and education == Tieu Vy was born and raised in Quảng Nam, Vietnam. She is a student of Ho Chi Minh City Pedagogical University. ==Pageantry== === Miss Vietnam 2018 === Tieu Vy was crowned Miss Vietnam 2018 on September 16, 2018 at the Phu Tho Indoor Stadium in Ho Chi Minh City. She succeeded outgoing by Miss Vietnam 2016, Đỗ Mỹ Linh. === Miss World 2018 === Tieu Vy represented Vietnam at the Miss World 2018 pageant in Sanya, China on 8 December 2018. ==References== ==External links== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Miss World 2018 delegates Category:Miss Vietnam winners Category:People from Quảng Nam Province Category:Vietnamese female models Category:Vietnamese beauty pageant winners
title: Trần Tiểu Vy
